entities.name: will start
entities.description: The event that Harry will participate in, described as starting on his whistle.

entities.name: my whistle
entities.description: Harry's whistle, used to signal the start of the event.

entities.name: precisely an hour
entities.description: The time Harry has to recover what has been taken from them.

entities.name: champions
entities.description: A group of champions participating in the event, mentioned as doing something but not specified.

entities.name: gillyweed
entities.description: An object that Harry uses to aid him in the water, described as being pulled out of his pocket and stuffed into his mouth.

entities.name: Harry
entities.description: The main character participating in the event, described as pulling off his shoes and socks, wading into the lake, and using gillyweed.

entities.name: shoes
entities.description: An object that Harry removes before participating in the event.

entities.name: socks
entities.description: An object that Harry removes before participating in the event.

entities.name: lake
entities.description: A location where the event takes place, described as being cold and icy.

relationships.description: Harry uses gillyweed to aid him in the water, described as being pulled out of his pocket and stuffed into his mouth.
Harry enters the lake as part of the event, described as wading in deeper.
